archimate:Requirement.name: BC.1.1.2: A representative of the governing body (e.g. a board member or equivalent) should be appointed business continuity owner, who is ultimately accountable for business continuity across the organisation.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
